value:
Hey! These clothes are actually kind
of cute! Why not buy me some new
shoes and jewelry while you're at it!

It's not like this isn't any fun! I'm just
not used to this kind of thing, so I'm
at a bit of a loss as to what to do.

Why don't you stop patrolling around
and enjoy the festivities a little, huh?
Spring won't last forever!

There's another girl that looks just
like me here already? And her name's
Selena? Bring her to me—now!

What? I have to help with the festival
preparations? Sounds like a pain.
I'll have my doppelgänger handle it.

Hey! Don't just stand there! Aren't
you going to at least offer me some
tea or something?$k$pI brought you this all the way from
$Nf after all...

Did you see how amazing I was?
I'll be expecting my reward!

Wearing cute clothes helps soothe
the sting a bit, at least!

Ugh! I told myself, "It's a festival! Just
have fun with it!" and now look...

I'll take more if you got it! One can
never have too much of stuff like this,
you know!

The name's Severa. I don't know
anything about this spring-festival
stuff, but I'll join in the fun, I guess!

Hey! Isn't this a festival? Stop looking
all stiff and relax a bit, would you?$k$pEveryone can use a little carefree fun
in their lives, you know. Otherwise
folks get irritable, don't they?$k$pThe world I came from was, well...
it was the absolute worst. The men
were all hopeless, for one thing.$k$pThere weren't even any shops with
cute jewelry and accessories...$k$pDon't give me that look. That stuff's
important, all right?!$k$pAnyway! We all need a little peace
and relaxation! So you better enjoy
this festival with everything you got!
やっ
遅い！
きゃあっ
なによ…！
Spring is here!
Hippity, hoppity, HALT!
You ready? You'd better be!
Don't you dare doze off!
How embarrassing...
ふふっ
The name's Severa.
Watch it! Hands off the ears!
Listen up, because I'm only going to say this once... Have a very "hoppy" spring!
Of course my outfit looks amazing. Did you expect anything less of me?
I know I look good in this outfit and all, but you're staring a little too hard, pal. Move along.
Wait, my mother is here?! Gods, if she sees me like this, I'll never live it down... Hide me!
I guess the spring festival isn't so bad... As long as you're here to spend it with me.
Let's get a move on!
You sure?
I'm going, I'm going...
